title: Bug 120216 - Group dialog should be shown even if the dataset is not set.
OB: When attempting to open the group dialog without setting the dataset, an error is displayed.
EB: The group dialog should be shown regardless of whether the dataset is set or not. As per template requirements, UI validation should not prevent the display of the dialog.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the group section.
3. Try to open the group dialog without setting a dataset.
